paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on KCNH2 variants, including penetrance data and functional studies.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 1 presented with syncope at age 20.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQT2 after family screening
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 2 was diagnosed with LQT2 at age 29.

individual_records.phenotype_details: no symptoms but carries the variant
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 3 is a carrier but remains asymptomatic.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with LQT2 but no symptoms
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Case 4 was diagnosed at age 35 but has not experienced symptoms.

functional_data.summary: The A561V variant showed impaired trafficking and function in vitro.

variants.additional_notes: The L539fs/47 variant was mentioned but not included as it does not belong to KCNH2.
key_quotes: ALLN can restore HERG-A561V mutant protein trafficking process.
The molecular chaperone CNX/CRT may affect the normal transport of mutant proteins.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
